cu.explanation_en: Setting PUSCH thread count to 0 will cause uplink processing thread allocation failures and prevent any PUSCH decoding capability in the CU.

du.explanation_en: Setting the system core to a negative value -1 will cause CPU core assignment errors and prevent proper front-haul interface initialization.
du.explanation_zh: 將系統核心設定為負值 -1 會導致 CPU 核心分配錯誤，並阻止正確的前傳介面初始化。
